mapper.select: SELECT G.EY_ACCOUNT_NUM as accountNum, G.AMOUNT_ADJ_CR as crAmountAdj, G.AMOUNT_ADJ_DR as drAmountAdj, G.AMOUNT_AUDIT_LAST as amountAuditLast FROM wp_g G where 1 = 1 and G.STATUS = 'Y' and G.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and G.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT G300.EY_ACCOUNT_NUM as accountNum, G300.ATTR1 as detail, G300.DR_AMOUNT_CNY as drAmount, G300.CR_AMOUNT_CNY as crAmount, G300.BEGIN_BALANCE_CNY as beginBalance FROM wp_g300 G300 where 1 = 1 and G300.STATUS = 'Y' and G300.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and G300.PERIOD = #{period}
